Guacamole.ingredients:
Avocado
 Tomato
 Onion
 Lime Juice
 Salt
 Cilantro
Guacamole.instructions:
1. Mash avocados in a bowl. 
2. Add diced tomatoes, finely chopped onions, lime juice, salt, and chopped cilantro. 
3. Mix ingredients thoroughly. 
4. Serve with chips or use as a topping.

Vegetable Stir-Fry.ingredients:
Assorted Vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, snap peas)
 Soy Sauce
 Garlic
 Ginger
 Sesame Oil
Vegetable Stir-Fry.instructions:
1. Heat sesame oil in a pan or wok. 
2. Sauté minced garlic and ginger until fragrant. 
3. Add chopped vegetables and stir-fry until tender-crisp. 
4. Pour soy sauce over the vegetables and toss well. 
5. Serve hot.

Fruit Salad.ingredients:
Mixed Fruit (strawberries, blueberries, pineapple, grapes)
 Honey
 Lime Juice
 Mint Leaves
Fruit Salad.instructions:
1. Wash and chop fruits into bite-sized pieces. 
2. Mix the fruits in a bowl. 
3. Drizzle honey and lime juice over the fruits. 
4. Garnish with fresh mint leaves. 
5. Chill before serving.
